line.originaltext: 6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos")

line.originaltext: 2 tablespoons butter or margarine
3 tablespoons all-purpose flour
1 3/4 cups water
1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce
1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder
1 teaspoon beef bouillon granules
3/4 teaspoon ground cumin
1/2 teaspoon salt
2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese or Cheddar cheese
line.annotation: create_ing(ing9, "2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese or Cheddar cheese")

line.originaltext: 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing10, "1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained")

line.originaltext: 1/3 cup chopped green onions
Place frozen burritos in a greased 13-in.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "13 in x 9 in x 2 in baking dish")

line.originaltext: Place frozen burritos in a greased 13-in.
Place frozen burritos in a greased 13-in.
baking dish; set aside.
In a saucepan, melt butter.
In a saucepan, melt butter.
Stir in flour until a smooth; gradually stir in water.
Stir in flour until a smooth; gradually stir in water.
line.annotation: mix(ing13, t1, ing14, "flour and butter", "until smooth")

line.originaltext: Stir in flour until a smooth; gradually stir in water.
Stir in flour until a smooth; gradually stir in water.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing3}, ing15, "flour mixture and water", "")

line.originaltext: Stir in flour until a smooth; gradually stir in water.
Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
line.annotation: cook(ing16, t1, ing17, "cooked flour mixture", "bring to boil")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
line.annotation: mix(ing17, t1, ing18, "stir flour solution", "stir for 2 minutes or until thickened")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add the tomato sauce, chili powder, bouillon, cumin and salt.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing19, "seasoned mixture", "")

line.originaltext: Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until thickened.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t1, ing20, "cooked seasoned mixture", "simmer, oncovered, 5 minutes")

line.originaltext: Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until thickened.
Pour over the burritos.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing20}, ing21, "covered burritos", "pour mixture over burritos")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with cheese, olives if desired and onions.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing21, ing9}, ing22, "final burrito", "sprinkle over burritos")

line.originaltext: Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
